name: Karbon Card
headline: Corporate Card solution for Indian businesses
description:
We at Karbon Cards provide corporate credit cards, vendor payment solutions and forex outward remittance products to Indian companies. We partners with banks and other FI's to provide comprehensive spend management and working capital solutions. Companies qualify for credit via a liberalized startup friendly underwriting process.

For those do not qualify, we provide payments option where companies can top up and use card/vendor payment solutions.

founders.name: Pei-fu Hsieh, Founder
founders.description: Pei-fu has over ten years of experience in PE/VC with Kleiner Perkins and 01VC. He has also worked at McKinsey and built multiple startups (Zalora, Easy Taxi and Groupon) with Rocket Internet. Prior to founding Karbon he has incubated close to ten fintech companies in Indonesia, India and Brazil.

founders.name: Sunil Kumar, Founder
founders.description:
Second time co-founder in Fintech Lending space from India
Currently working on Karbon Corporate Cards, similar to Brex
Love startups, fintechs, and sports
10+ Yrs working experince in Finance, and 10 Yrs in Software
IIT Bombay Graduate, and staying in Bangalore, India
Worked for 10 Yrs in USA before coming back to India

## Why Do Users Trust Us?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabacb2b498a901965702_873.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **Arun Ramanathan**
Karbon has been a great partner for our business. Their platform is user-friendly and we appreciate the transparency they provide throughout the remittance process. We can count on them to deliver our payments on time and with no hidden fees.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabacb2b498a90196573f_666c158ae76bcbecf52d86a0_Karbon-business-p-130x130q80.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **Shankar R**
Karbon has been a game changer for our business. We needed a reliable and efficient way to make international payments and Karbon has delivered. Their customer support team is always available to help and we've had no issues with the remittance process. Highly recommended!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabadb2b498a901965871_121sad.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **Aishwarya Nair**
Karbon has made our foreign outward remittance process so much simpler. Their platform is easy to use and we can track our transactions in real-time. Plus, their rates are very competitive. We're very happy with their service.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabadb2b498a90196587a_Untitled-1.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **Nidhi Menon**
We were looking for a trustworthy foreign outward remittance service and Karbon has exceeded our expectations. Their team is professional and responsive, and they've helped us navigate complex compliance requirements. We now use Karbon for all our international transactions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196598c_image%20\(7\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **YAP**
They increased our credit limit within 24 hours. Extremely positive, and I recommend Karbon to all of my friends starting/running companies. Plus, they keep adding new features every few months
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a9019659e2_Frame-12%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **Jupiter**
Karbon Payout works best for a startup like ours. Our manual work was reduced drastically with Payout which helped us to focus on core business activities. Kudos to the team for providing an excellent vendor payment service!

## Frequently Asked Questions
What do we do here at Karbon Business?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabc30310693e26787fed_Cross%20icon.svg)
We are a fintech service that caters to the needs of Indian businesses of all shapes and sizes! We mainly focus on providing foreign remittance services for all B2B payments and prepaid card for corporate expense management.
How does Karbon Card help with B2B finance management?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabc30310693e26787fed_Cross%20icon.svg)
We offer a prepaid card that provides real-time tracking of expenses, that comes with automated reporting, and budget controls, making it easier for businesses to monitor spending. 
Who can benefit from using Karbon’s services?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabc30310693e26787fed_Cross%20icon.svg)
Literally, any business based in India that has business remittance [Sending & Receiving business money internationally] or expense management requirements.
How do I apply for a prepaid card?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabc30310693e26787fed_Cross%20icon.svg)
Applying for a Karbon Card is easy. [Click here, ](https://www.karboncard.com/<https:/www.karboncard.com/contact>)fill out some basic details and you are done! Our team will get in touch with you to guide you through the onboarding process. It is that simple! 
Is there a fee for using Karbon Forex services?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabc30310693e26787fed_Cross%20icon.svg)
No. We charge nothing to initiate or enable a business cross-border payment. At Karbon, we state our competitive markup fee upfront. For specific pricing information, please sign up [here](https://www.karboncard.com/<https:/www.karboncard.com/contact>) so we can get back to you!
## Accept Global Payments in 30+ Currencies

## Why Do Users Trust Us?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabacb2b498a901965702_873.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **Arun Ramanathan**
Karbon has been a great partner for our business. Their platform is user-friendly and we appreciate the transparency they provide throughout the remittance process. We can count on them to deliver our payments on time and with no hidden fees.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabacb2b498a90196573f_666c158ae76bcbecf52d86a0_Karbon-business-p-130x130q80.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **Shankar R**
Karbon has been a game changer for our business. We needed a reliable and efficient way to make international payments and Karbon has delivered. Their customer support team is always available to help and we've had no issues with the remittance process. Highly recommended!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabadb2b498a901965871_121sad.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **Aishwarya Nair**
Karbon has made our foreign outward remittance process so much simpler. Their platform is easy to use and we can track our transactions in real-time. Plus, their rates are very competitive. We're very happy with their service.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabadb2b498a90196587a_Untitled-1.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **Nidhi Menon**
We were looking for a trustworthy foreign outward remittance service and Karbon has exceeded our expectations. Their team is professional and responsive, and they've helped us navigate complex compliance requirements. We now use Karbon for all our international transactions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196598c_image%20\(7\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **YAP**
They increased our credit limit within 24 hours. Extremely positive, and I recommend Karbon to all of my friends starting/running companies. Plus, they keep adding new features every few months
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a9019659e2_Frame-12%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabaeb2b498a90196590a_unnamed%20\(1\).png)
##### **Jupiter**
Karbon Payout works best for a startup like ours. Our manual work was reduced drastically with Payout which helped us to focus on core business activities. Kudos to the team for providing an excellent vendor payment service!

## Frequently Asked Questions
What do we do here at Karbon Business?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabc30310693e26787fed_Cross%20icon.svg)
We are a fintech service that caters to the needs of Indian businesses of all shapes and sizes! We mainly focus on providing foreign remittance services for all B2B payments and prepaid card for corporate expense management.
How does Karbon Card help with B2B finance management?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabc30310693e26787fed_Cross%20icon.svg)
We offer a prepaid card that provides real-time tracking of expenses, that comes with automated reporting, and budget controls, making it easier for businesses to monitor spending. 
Who can benefit from using Karbon’s services?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabc30310693e26787fed_Cross%20icon.svg)
Literally, any business based in India that has business remittance [Sending & Receiving business money internationally] or expense management requirements.
How do I apply for a prepaid card?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabc30310693e26787fed_Cross%20icon.svg)
Applying for a Karbon Card is easy. Click here, ⟨31⟩fill out some basic details and you are done! Our team will get in touch with you to guide you through the onboarding process. It is that simple! 
Is there a fee for using Karbon Forex services?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ceff4b2fa1be44c3929a5/670fabc30310693e26787fed_Cross%20icon.svg)
No. We charge nothing to initiate or enable a business cross-border payment. At Karbon, we state our competitive markup fee upfront. For specific pricing information, please sign up here⟨31⟩ so we can get back to you!

generated_description:
**Karbon Card: The Future of Business Payments in India**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Karbon Card is redefining how Indian businesses manage their payments. With a mission to simplify financial transactions, Karbon specializes in corporate credit cards, vendor payment solutions, and foreign exchange remittance, all tailored for Indian companies.

### What They Offer
1. **Corporate Cards**: Karbon provides corporate prepaid cards that enable businesses to take control of their spending with features like real-time tracking and budget controls.
2. **Vendor Payments**: They offer flexible vendor payment options, designed especially for startups and growing businesses, ensuring seamless financial interactions.
3. **Forex Services**: Karbon simplifies international payments with competitive rates for both inward and outward remittances, catering to businesses needing currency exchanges without steep fees.

### Key Features
- **Liberalized Underwriting**: Qualifying for credit is simpler thanks to an approach that's friendly to startups, opening doors for many businesses to manage their spending more effectively.
- **No Hidden Fees**: Transparency is a hallmark of Karbon's service, ensuring that clients know what they're paying for upfront, without surprise charges.
- **Quick Setup**: The onboarding process is streamlined, allowing companies to set up their services fast—ideal for those who need immediate solutions.

### The Team and Location
Based in Bengaluru, India, Karbon boasts a dedicated team of 144 employees, including expert guidance under the mentorship of Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer.

### Customer-Centric Approach
Karbon Card is built for various sectors, from freelancers to large enterprises, and emphasizes superior customer support to assist in navigating complex financial landscapes.

### Partners and Trust
Karbon has established relationships with well-known banking and financial institutions like Visa, Mastercard, and Yes Bank, which adds credibility and trustworthiness to their offerings.

### Why Choose Karbon?
If you're an Indian business looking for a complete payment solution that streamlines processes, reduces costs, and enhances financial control, Karbon Card is a compelling option. With features aimed at boosting cash flow and simplifying foreign transactions, it stands out in the competitive fintech landscape.

Explore more on their website: [Karbon Card](https://www.karboncard.com/).
